Description: On I-495 at mile marker 45.2 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-64 in the City of Hampton, at Hampton Roads Bridge Tunnel East, motorists can expect potential delays due to a bridge/tunnel stoppage. All east lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Bridge/Tunnel Stoppage

Description: On I-85 at mile marker 15.6 in the Town of South Hill, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The north right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On Rt. 739 in the County of Franklin, in the vicinity of Algoma Rd; Rt. 740E/W (Franklin County), motorists can expect delays due to weather. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Weather Incident - Other Weather - Closed
